Career Profile

I’m a versatile software engineer based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. I have 10+ years of experiece in building and testing desktop applications, as well as architecting and deploying backend production systems. I’m inquisitive and enthusiatic to learn new things, especially in the tech world. I have an interest in developing mobile and web based applications, the DevOps pipeline, and much more. Check out my profile to learn a little more about my experiences.

Experiences

Senior Software Engineer

Nov 2013 - Present
The Boeing Company, Ridley Park, Pennsylvania

Manage & support post processing ETL data pipleine for Chinook flight test operations.

  • Led team of 4 developers and IT professionals in deploying on premises backend production environment to host 100+ TB data warehouse and analysis application using Java, Python, JavaScript, and Docker.
  • Spearheaded effort to ensure compliance with US government DFARS cybersecurity requirements to reduce risk of security breach and data loss.
  • Trained colleagues on usage of Java native interface with C program to execute statistical calculations of flight test data, delivering JNI enabled shared object to add to data processing pipeline within 72 hours.
  • Established repeatable process to read flat files and insert data into SQL database using Python with cx_Oracle library, searching through 37 TB of flat files.
  • Managed data cleaning effort for flight instrument descriptions and mnemonics due to flight test operation human error using SQL, cleansing up to 60% of all flights taken place (over 4,000 flights).
  • Established staging, beta, and alpha software release process and launching mechanism utilizing Bash shell scripting, Linux user groups, and access control lists.
  • Developed repeatable process to read and launch applications based on configuration files while processing engineering unit converted data using Perl, reducing operator input, and improving execution time by 60%.
  • Assessed and addressed software vulnerabilities and flaws using static scanning and Linux access control lists to remove 100% of hard-coded passwords, SQL injection vulnerabilities and directory traversal vulnerabilities.
  • Identified system JVM configuration issue and improved launch time of 3 Java desktop applications between 70% to 83% by using alternative Linux random number configuration.
  • Established and trained team of 8+ in basic configuration management practices and issue tracking in Gitlab.
  • Evaluated and advised management on tools and best practices for software development thereby reducing risk of software loss and improving software recovery process by 72 hours.

Software Engineer

Nov 2008 - Oct 2013
The Boeing Company, Ridley Park, Pennsylvania

Software and systems support for Chinook simulations, systems integrations and lab testing.

  • Setup and configured systems integrated test environment, including operating system, real-time software environment, and out the window visuals used by Chinook Mk6 aircrafts.
  • Developed, tested, and integrated real-time linear and quadratic interpolation algorithms to dynamically acquire and process data received from iridium GPS signals using C.
  • Designed message structure algorithm to decode 3 types of iridium GPS signals for research and development of the High Integrity Global Positioning System (iGPS) using C++.
  • Defined and automated unit and functional test procedures for Chinook Mk6 flight controller system.
  • Collaborated with 2 avionics engineers and executed collection of situational Arinc 429 and MIL-STD 1553 bus data from V22 Osprey Master Ice Protection Controller using Dewetron data acquisition system.
